key.name: switch-to-prev-non-empty-workspace
key.summary: Move to a non-empty workspace above

key.name: switch-to-next-non-empty-workspace
key.summary: Move to a non-empty workspace below

key.name: switch-to-prev-non-empty-workspace-enabled
key.summary: Enable/Disable move to a non-empty workspace above

key.name: switch-to-next-non-empty-workspace-enabled
key.summary: Enable/Disable move to a non-empty workspace below

key.name: workspace-wrap-around
key.summary: Allow workspace wrap around in switcher
key.description: When switching workspaces, going down from the bottom workspace switches to the top workspace. Likewise, up from the top workspace goes to the bottom workspace
